title: Honour Capsules
body:
I'm currently lvl 4 in the honour system and I've been getting a lot of honours and being a team player but I still haven't gotten my capsule yet. I'm not sure how or when I get one but I see everyone else getting one and not myself so I was wondering if there was a problem or if I'm doing something wrong? 

Plz help

replies.body: Honor Capsules are a bonus drop tied to key fragments. They aren't a guaranteed drop, but you have a chance of earning them anytime a key fragment might have dropped for you. They replace the key fragment, but also give fragments themselves so it's a pretty good trade off. With that being said, once you've accumulated your 12 fragments for the cycle, you won't be getting fragment or capsule drops until they refresh.
